name: hn-realify
description: Hacker News realified. Stories pages are auto-updated as they change.
author: Kanat Bekt <bekt17+gh@gmail.com>

scripts.build:chrome: npm run build && mkdir -p chrome/dist && cp dist/realify.min.js chrome/dist/
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build && mkdir -p firefox/data/dist && cp dist/realify.min.js firefox/data/dist/
scripts.pack:chrome: npm run build:chrome; cd chrome; zip -r ../release-chrome.zip *
scripts.pack:firefox: npm run build:firefox; cd firefox; zip -r ../release-ff.xpi *
